mapping.name: ${local_pro_sign}_VERGEORDER_%%Y%%M%%D_${target_pro_sign}_${code}.csv
mapping.templet: 省际边界优化协调单_三期.ftl
mapping.filepara:
SELECT distinct code, l.pro_sign as local_pro_sign, t.pro_sign as target_pro_sign
FROM MOD_VSITE_VERGEORDER v, mod_vsite_city l, mod_vsite_city t where v.local_pro = l.pro_name and v.target_pro = t.pro_name and ((order_attribute = 0 AND ISPROVINCE = 1) OR (order_attribute = 0 AND ISPROVINCE IN (5, 7)) OR (order_attribute = 1 AND ISPROVINCE IN (2, 3, 7,8))) AND TRUNC(ACTION_TIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D 00:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
mapping.sql: SELECT to_char(ACTION_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') as 时间戳, CODE AS 协调单编号, order_type AS 协调单类型, local_pro AS 本地省份, local_city AS 本地地市, target_pro AS 目标省份, target_city AS 目标地市, title AS 协调单标题, order_desc AS 问题描述, to_char(initi_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS 协调单发起时间, to_char(complete_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS 协调单期望完成时间, initiator AS 发起方人姓名, initiator_contact AS 发起方人联系方式, reciever AS 接收人姓名, reciever_contact AS 接收人联系方式, step_type AS 当前环节, action_type AS 执行结果, remark AS 备注, to_char(actual_complete_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS 协调单实际完成时间 FROM MOD_VSITE_VERGEORDER WHERE ( (order_attribute=0 AND ISPROVINCE=1) OR (order_attribute=0 AND ISPROVINCE IN (5,7) ) OR (order_attribute=1 AND ISPROVINCE IN (2,3,7,8)) ) AND TRUNC(ACTION_TIME)=to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT sub.SUB_CODE AS 子协调单编号,
sub.NE_TYPE AS 网元级别, sub.NE_ID AS 网元标识, sub.NE_CHNAME AS 网元名称, sub.ADJUST_TYPE AS 边界优化调整类别, sub.SUB_TITLE AS 子协调单标题, sub.ADJUST_CONTENT AS 边界优化调整内容, sub.ADJUST_RESULT AS 调整结果记录, sub.SUB_REMARK , (SELECT REPLACE(wmsys.wm_concat(t.file_name), ',', '|') AS FILEATTACH FROM MOD_VSITE_VERGEORDER_FILE t where t.order_code = sub.code and t.order_subcode = sub.sub_code GROUP BY t.order_code, t.order_subcode) AS 附件 ,sub.FEEDBACK FROM MOD_VSITE_VERGEORDER M, MOD_VSITE_VERGEORDER_SUB Sub WHERE M.Code = Sub.Code AND ((M.order_attribute = 0 AND M.ISPROVINCE = 1) OR (M.order_attribute = 0 AND M.ISPROVINCE IN (5, 7)) OR (M.order_attribute = 1 AND M.ISPROVINCE IN (2, 3, 7,8))) AND TRUNC(M.ACTION_TIME) = to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
